attributes.action: Direct all Politicians to attend training courses on honesty, integrity and openess.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that many Politicians do not live in the real world. When they are interviewed they never give straight answers, they are evasive and talk around the question without giving answers. To the general public they present themselves as dishonest and have the lowest rating of all professions.Bring them back to reality and force them to be honest and upfront.
